Title: Worthy are You, Lord

Verses.11:
Worthy are You, our Lord and our God, [*]
	to receive glory, and honor, and power.
For You created all things, [*]
	and it was by Your will they existed and were created.
Verses.9:
Worthy are You, Lord, to take the scroll [*]
	and to break its seals.
For You were slaughtered. [t]
	You redeemed them for God by Your blood, [*]
	from every tribe, tongue, people, and nation.
Verses.10:
You have made them into a kingdom and priests to our God, [*]
	and they will reign upon the earth.
Verses.12:
Worthy is the Lamb that was slaughtered [t]
	to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, [*]
	and might, and glory, and honor, and blessing.

Changes: 2023-10-16 - Paul Prins: First translation based on Greek, and Latin
